lead_paragraph: Dany Heatley had three goals and an assist to help Canada, the defending champion, beat Slovenia, 5-1, in their preliminary-round opener at the world hockey championship in Halifax, Nova Scotia. In Quebec City, the Czech Republic beat Denmark, 5-2.
